content: and work 7hdc join as above 7sts round 2 ch1 and work 2hdc into each st around join 14sts round 3 ch1 half_double_crochet into each st around join 14sts round 4 ch1 work a 4dc bobble see special stitches into the first st makes thumb half_double_crochet in each remaining st around join 14sts round 5 ch1 half_double_crochet into each st around join 14sts rnds 6 & 7 ch1 single_crochet in each st around join 14sts fasten_off and hide loose ends 0101010 snow boots boots are crocheted in joined rounds at the end of each round join the last st to the first with a sl st round 1 magic_ring ch1 not a stitch from now on work 6hdc join as above 6sts round 2 ch1 work 2hdc in each st around join 12sts round 3 ch1 work 2hdc in each st around join 24sts round 4 ch1 single_crochet into each st around join 24sts round 5 ch1 half_double_crochet into the back loop only of each st around join 24sts rnds 6 ch1 half_double_crochet around join 24sts round 7 ch1 single_crochet in each of the first 8sts hdc2tog x 4 single_crochet in each of the remaining 8sts join 20sts round 8 ch1 single_crochet in each of the first 8sts hdc2tog x 2 single_crochet in each of the remaining 8sts join 18sts rnds 9 & 10 ch1 half_double_crochet in each st around join 18sts round 9 ch1 single_crochet into the back loop only of each st around join 18sts fasten_off and hide loose ends 0101010 other clothing options weebee snowman isn t called dress me up snowman just for fun as he/she is the exact same shape as my standard sized weebee doll and animal weebee doll patterns he/she can wear all of the tops trousers dresses sweaters etc from their outfit patterns they in turn can wear his/her hat scarf mittens and boots for example… here is weebee snowman with weebee reindeer and weebee bunny… in this picture snowman has swapped clothing and hats with weebee bunny and in these next photo s weebee snowman is playing dress up in the first photo she is wearing the pretty shells dress and the hat from the garden party outfit in the second she is wearing the hooded holiday cape with the dress and boots from the christmas day outfit pattern in the last photo she is wearing the dress and hat from the garden party outfit snowman weebee loves to dress up ~ ~ i really hope you have enjoyed completing the items within this pattern please share your weebee projects with us on the weebee appreciation society facebook page link on page 2 and don t forget to add your project to ravelry
